response.overview: Ducks in a Row serves the purpose of creatively enlightening viewers on the hardships of mental illness, more specifically Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD), to represent OCD correctly in an aesthetically jarring manner, telling the story of what a day, week, and month of OCD looks and feels like, getting in depth and placing the viewer in the mind of the victim with both visual and conceptual intent.
response.title: Ducks in a Row (Short Film)
